Utilize estes cartões presente como Mi Credits. Pode receber cartões presente após participar em eventos e promoções Xiaomi
Mi Credits adicionados via cartão presente vão ser gastos primeiro
Não foi possível ligar à rede
O que posso comprar com Mi Credits?

Está prestes a utilizar Mi Credits, que é um serviço fornecido pela Xiaomi Inc. Antes de utilizar este serviço, deve concordar com os Termos de Utilização descritos em %1$s. Toque em OK se concordar com os termos e conditions descritos em %1$s. É necessário ligar à Internet para utilizar os Mi Credits
Após confirmar a compra, o seu telefone vai
Carregar via mensagem de texto pode ser mais caro: <font color=red>￥%1$d = %2$d Mi Credits</font>
As operadoras cobram ￥%1$s de taxa de serviço pelo carregamento
Uma SMS vai ser enviado para a sua operadora após tocar em \"Carregar\"
Erro ao enviar mensagem: não foi possível contactar a operadora
Erro ao enviar mensagem: tente inserir o cartão SIM novamente
Erro ao enviar mensagem: existe um erro no conteúdo
Após confirmar a compra, o seu telefone vai
Vai receber uma mensagem de confirmação brevemente
To secure your spendings, verify your Mi account
Erro ao instalar o plugin de segurança %1$s
Não instalou o plugin de segurança %1$s. Instalar agora?
Permitir a utilização da Câmara nas Definições para utilizar as funcionalidades
Permitir o envio de SMS nas Definições para utilizar as funcionalidades
Número de cartão ou palavra-passe inválidos
O valor seleccionado tem de ser igual ao do cartão pré-pago. Escolher outro valor vai anular o cartão. Esta acção não pode ser revertida
Se o valor do cartão pré-pago não for <font color=red>￥%1$s</font>, o cartão vai ser anulado. A Xiaomi não é responsável por qualquer perda monetária que possa ocorrer dos erros do utilizador

Pode configurar uma Conta Xiaomi mais tarde nas Definições
Adicionar este dispositivo aos dispositivos verificados
Certifique-se que memoriza a sua palavra-passe. Pode utilizá-la para iniciar sessão noutros serviços Mi
A sua verificação de início de sessão está incompleta
Começar de novo agora? As mensagens de verificação podem levar até 10 minutos a serem entregues quando o telefone está dentro do alcance da rede da sua operadora
O código que introduziu não está correcto
O formato do número de telefone que introduziu é inválido
O código que introduziu não está correcto

Este serviço necessita de permissões para funcionar normalmente. As suas informações pessoais ficam protegidas de acordo com as leis em vigor e com a nossa Política de Privacidade:

Aceder à câmara: experimente a gravação em tempo real para configurar o Avatar

Se não concordar em dar esta autorização ou com o envio dos seus dados pessoais, não vai poder utilizar esta funcionalidade, mas não vai afectar a utilização normal desta aplicação. Pode desligar o aviso de permissão nas Definições ou retirar o seu consentimento

This photo is invalid. Try a different one.

Logs are used only for diagnostics.
"You can associate up to 3 Mi Accounts with a phone number. Can't add new accounts."
Too many verification codes have been sent to this number. Wait 24 hours and try again.
"We'll use this email to verify your account"
To use MiCoin, you need to log in your Xiaomi account. Please enable the Xiaomi account service in Settings-Application Management.

"You're about to use Mi Coin, which is a service provided by Xiaomi Inc. Before you can use this service, you must agree to the Terms of Service. Touch OK if you agree to the terms and conditions described in the %1$s and %2$s. You need to connect to the internet, locate you device to use Mi Coin."
Welcome to MiCoin, you can use this app to recharge MiCoin, check your giftcards, etc.
"Can't set App lock while using Split screen."
When you use a mobile phone recharge card to recharge MiCoin, you can use the camera permission to identify the card number and card secret, etc. by turning on the camera permission.
Please read and agree to the %1$s and %2$s
Please agree to the terms and use.

"Welcome to Mi Coin, this application provides functions such as Mi Coin recharge and gift certificate viewing. We will process your relevant information as required by laws and regulations. Here, we solemnly remind you: 1. 1. Before you use Mibi products or services, please read and understand the Privacy Policy carefully, and use the relevant products or services after confirming your full understanding and agreement. 2. 2. During the use of this app, internet and camera permissions are required. We will ask you whether you are allowed to open related permissions item by item when you first call. You can also manage related permissions in the App access Privacy Settings - Authorization Management or your device system Settings. %1$s"
"3. We take and protect your personal information very seriously. If you have any questions, comments or suggestions about the content of this policy, you can contact us by visiting %1$s. "

"3. If you do not agree to the Privacy Policy, we will provide a browse-only mode. You can choose from [%1$s]. 4. We take and protect your personal information very seriously. If you have any questions, comments or suggestions about the content of this policy, you can contact us by visiting %2$s. "
"Mi Wallet isn't installed on your device."

string.name: mibi_frozen_text
string.Data: Your account is frozen. <font color=#33aaff>Contact our customer support.</font>

resources.string: "Can't use camera now. Turn off Incognito mode in the Settings to be able to use camera."
If the payment is unsuccessful, call %1$s
Amount must be between Mi Coins %1$s and %2$s.
%1$s Mi Coins recharged，%2$s Mi Coins paied
"You haven't installed %1$s. Download and install it now?"
Used for OCR to identify mobile phone recharge card number, etc.
All recharges are one-time recharges, and the selected face value must be consistent with the recharge card. A wrong selection will result in loss of funds.
Any loss caused by the discrepancy between the card number, face value, password and the actual information shall be borne by you. Double check the information you provide before you proceed.
Enter your card number, face value, and password. Any loss caused by the discrepancy between the information you provide and the actual information shall be borne by you.
"You can't use Mi Coins after authorization has been revoked."
Payment will be complete in about 3 minutes…
Purchase CNY %s worth of Mi Coins
"You can't buy physical goods using Mi Coins."

"If you do not agree to the Privacy Policy, we will provide a browse-only mode. In this mode, we will show you the introduction of Micoin related services.
In this mode, we only need to request internet access and will not collect, store, share or use any of your personal information.
During the browsing process, if you wish to carry out Micoin-related business, you need to agree to the relevant personal information processing rules. We will process your personal information according to your authorization and relevant provisions of laws and regulations."
MiCoin Recharge Balance Check Gift Voucher Management

"MiCoin is an aggregated cash register for virtual businesses within the Xiaomi Group. It supports payment methods such as Alipay, WeChat, and Mi Wallet. It also provides pre-paid cards and marketing products such as Mi Coin Card and MiCoin Gift Vouchers.
Services Provided："
The current mode is only browsing, please click the button to experience the Micoin service.
Failed to withdraw consent, please try again

"If you withdraw your consent to the Mibibi app privacy policy, we will stop collecting your personal information and delete the personal information collected by the app in accordance with the law, unless other laws and regulations specify the retention period of personal information. Because the provision of MiCoin services relies on the collection of necessary personal information, if you withdraw your consent, it will be deemed that you do not agree that we continue to provide MiCoin services to you and give up your assets and rights in the MiCoin app. Cause a certain loss, and personal information cannot be recovered, please choose carefully."
Failed to log out of service, please try again

"If you log out of the MiCoin service, we will stop collecting your personal information and delete the personal information collected by the application in accordance with the law, except for other laws and regulations that clearly stipulate the retention period of personal information. Because the provision of MiCoin services relies on the collection of necessary personal information, if you cancel the service, you will be deemed to disagree that we continue to provide MiCoin services to you and give up your assets and rights in the MiCoin app. Cause a certain loss, and personal information cannot be recovered, please choose carefully."
Withdrawal of consent has been completed and local data has been cleared
The logout service has been completed, and the local data has been cleared.
MiCoin permission changes are not supported in MIUI 10 and below versions. If you need to modify the permissions, please upgrade the MIUI system to MIUI 11 and above versions.
